vague_description: Determine the optimal strategies for resource allocation, livestock management, and crop production that will lead to the highest financial return in a multi-variable farming scenario.
detailed_description: How should the farmer operate over the next five years to maximize profit using \param{AllSpace}, \param{NHeifers}, \param{NMilk}, \param{HeiferSpace}, \param{CowSpace}, \param{CowCalve}, \param{PriceBullock}, \param{PriceHeifer}, \param{PriceCow}, \param{LossHeifer}, \param{LossCow}, \param{RevenueMilk}, \param{NMaxCow}, \param{CowOutlay}, \param{CowGrain}, \param{CowSugar}, \param{SugarPerAcre}, \param{SpaceGrain}, \param{GrainDivision}, \param{GrainYield}, \param{BuyPriceGrain}, \param{SellPriceGrain}, \param{BuyPriceSugar}, \param{SellPriceSugar}, \param{LabourHeifers}, \param{LabourCow}, \param{LabourGrain}, \param{LabourSugar}, \param{ExtraHeifers}, \param{ExtraCow}, \param{ExtraGrain}, \param{ExtraSugar}, \param{LabourCost}, \param{LabourHour}, and \param{ExtraLabourCost}?
target_objective: Maximize the farmer's profit over the next five years
target_constraints: Total space used by heifers and cows cannot exceed AllSpace
Number of heifers is initially NHeifers and cannot be negative
Each cow can calve at most CowCalve times over the five years
Number of cows cannot exceed NMaxCow
Number of acres allocated to sugar production cannot exceed SugarPerAcre
Number of acres allocated to grain production cannot exceed SpaceGrain
Total space allocated to grain must be a multiple of GrainDivision
Maximum labour hours available without extra cost is LabourHour
target_parameters: Total space available for all animals and activities
Maximum number of cows that can be housed
Amount of grain consumed by a cow
Amount of sugar consumed by a cow
Amount of sugar produced per acre
Space required per acre of grain
Division of overall space dedicated to grain production
Labour hours required for grain production
Labour hours required for sugar production
